Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
09.04.2013 JH SCR18066 BXA407D: Changed calculation of the Total pledge prohibited
24.04.2012 GB SCR17272 BXA407D: Changed calucation the Total pledge prohibited
13.04.2011 GB SCR16261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
30.04.2010 SH SCR15496 BXA407C/D Changes in client selection regarding legal
connected clients
13.02.2009 GB SCR14392 Extended task BXA407D with Total Pledge prohibition
24.08.2007 SH SCR12840 Splitted part 1 into 1a/1b and changed parameters
for BXA900; BXA407C Added <header_id> and <footer_id>
17.08.2007 SH SCR12816 Changed test on Sum (CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS) > 0 to
Sum (CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS) <> 0 (credit balance should be also selected)
17.04.2007 SH SCR12450 Restructured selection of CMON where TCDO rows a created
to use now DSQL, because of the extended selection for sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS)
> 0 (from legal group)
10.01.2007 SH SCR12213 Added missing test on TCOD_REPORTTYPE = 'AVA'
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- uses for error handling
-- Get sys language, uses to switch back to sys language if report was produce
reports has to be printed in related client language
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occured
... check if it's a re-start of BXA407
... if it's not a re-start, then the temp table TCOD has to be populated
with clients, which have to reported
-- If Client exists which have to be reported, then start to prepare the report
-- Selection of COUT regarding the frequence code
... first build DBSQL WhereClause for the selection of COUT rows
... for monthly requests
... for 2 weekly requests
... for weekly requests
... for daily requests
-- If min. one TCDO was stored, then a report has to be created

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CMON_ADMNO, CMON_CLNTNO from :1/CMON a, :1/ADMN b, :1/CLNT c where a.CMON_YEAR = :2 and a.CMON_MONTH = :3 and a.CMON_CURRENCY = c.CLNT108_ACC_CURR and b.ADMN_NO = a.CMON_ADMNO and b.ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and b.ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and a.CMON_ADMNO = c.CLNT101_ADMNO and a.CMON_CLNTNO = c.CLNT102_CLNTNO and c.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = c.CLNT101_ADMNO and c.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = c.CLNT102_CLNTNO and (select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALDEBTORS) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMON d, :1/CLNT e where e.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = c.CLNT101_ADMNO and e.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = c.CLNT102_CLNTNO and d.CMON_ADMNO = e.CLNT101_ADMNO and d.CMON_CLNTNO = e.CLNT102_CLNTNO and d.CMON_YEAR = :2 and d.CMON_MONTH = :3 and d.CMON_CURRENCY = c.CLNT108_ACC_CURR) <> 0 order by a.CMON_ADMNO, a.CMON_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Store only clients to TCOD, if not already written to TCOD in
part 1a. Selection COUT
-- If min. one TCDO was stored, then a report has to be created
-- Reset variables
-- Switch report language to client language
-- BXA407A Store report archive
... build filename for temporary XML Files
-- BXA407B Store XML header
-- BXA407C Header
-- BXA407D - Detail lines
-- Switch system language back to system language
-- Prepare variables
-- Print detail lines

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTC + CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH + CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMCD, :1/CLNT where (CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH <> 0 or CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH <> 0) and CMCD_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMCD_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and :2 for fetch only

select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALFACTACC + CMON_CURRBALSPECIALACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALFACTACC + CMON_CURRBALRETENTIONACC+CMON_CURRBALDISPUTESACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY + CMON_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS + CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT - CMON_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALARRANGEMENTS) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALPAYMENTSETTLE) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_FINANCEABOVEREFLIM) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CLIENTBALANCEREFLIM) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALWKA) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_FINTRANSFERPROHIBINCLBAT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMON, :1/CLNT where CMON_YEAR = :2 and CMON_MONTH = :3 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':4' and CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and :5 for fetch only

select CMCD_MARKCODE, cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTC + CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSC) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH + CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMCD, :1/CLNT where (CMCD_SPECIALACCOUNTH <> 0 or CMCD_DISPUTESGROSSH <> 0) and CMCD_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMCD_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and :2 group by CMCD_MARKCODE order by CMCD_MARKCODE for fetch only
